name: BlissHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on my bedroom light”
”Alexa, turn off my bedroom light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can simply ask Alexa to control your BlissLights products, after connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
1. Download our “BlissHome” app from App Store or Google Play store and then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. WiFi connect and configure your products in “BlissHome” app and change appropriate names for your products;
3. Download Alexa app from App Store or Google Play store. Enable “BlissHome” skill on Alexa app, you'll be brought to the login page and follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”;
5. Now all setup is finished. 

If you experience any problem, please contact us at: support@blisslights.com.

For additional information about connecting smart home products, visit: https://tinyurl.com/connecting-smart-products 

Here are some examples of voice commands “BlissHome” offers:
* Alexa, turn on my bedroom light
* Alexa, turn off my bedroom light
* Alexa, dim my bedroom light
* Alexa, brighten my bedroom light
* Alexa, set the bedroom light to 50 percent
* Alexa, set bedroom light to green
